testcase.brief: Verify that the recurrent schedule works well after long time (for weeks at least).
testcase.description:
Pre-Condition:
Configure and bind a PPSK SSID. Configure 4 user groups, password auto generated, without setting the time range. Set the user groups to the PPSK SSID.
Test Procedure:
1. Configure a 'recurrent' schedule. 2. Set the schedule to the 4 user groups. 3. Configure max user accounts for the 4 user groups. 4. Check the validity of the user accounts once the start time reached. 5. Record the time it takes to complete the PSK-PMK converting for all the user accounts.

step.desc: Configure and bind a PPSK SSID. Configure 4 user groups, password auto generated, without setting the time range. Set the user groups to the PPSK SSID.
2. Set the schedule to the 4 user groups.
3. Configure max user accounts for the 4 user groups.
4. Check the validity of the user accounts once the start time reached.
5. Record the time it takes to complete the PSK-PMK converting for all the user accounts.
